name: Manas Thakur
content: Manas Thakur Manas Thakur Faculty Member | CSE, IIT Bombay Office: CC 308 (New CSE Building) Department of Computer Science & Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Bombay Powai, Mumbai 400 076, Maharashtra, India Email: manas@cse.iitb.ac.in Phone (intra): 7739 Group: CompL (Part of PLATO) Research Interests: Program analysis, Compiler optimizations, Programming languages Featured interview in BitStream 2024: Read here! Want to do research with me? If you like the research we do and aspire to join the team: Go through the Openings page to understand the requirements and how it might be. Read this primer on enhancing (and reducing) the chances of receiving an email response. Keep following the CSE IITB admissions page for application dates and details. Recent Work Memory Optimizations for OO Languages [CGO 2026, OOPSLA 2025, PLDI 2024] Staged Analysis for JIT Compilers [FMSD 2024, SAS 2022, SPLASH-C 2022, OOPSLA 2019, TOPLAS 2019] Optimizing Dynamic-Language Programs [OOPSLA 2023, VMIL 2023] Functional and Parallelizing Transformations [Scala 2025, CASCON 2022, ISSTA 2021, ECOOP 2021] Context-Sensitive Pointer Analysis [Onward! 2020, CC 2020, CC 2019] Recent Highlights Aditya's talk proposal accepted at RHPL 2025. Arjun and Bhavya's paper is accepted for publication at CGO 2026. CompL @ IICT 2025: Aditya and Meetesh giving talks; Preet presenting a poster. Aditya receives the George B. Fernandes Excellence in PhD Research Progress Award. Aditya's paper is accepted for publication at OOPSLA 2025. Shiv, Shrikha and Heemmanshuu's submission gets accepted at Scala 2025. Selected Posts Daring the archetypal On being resolute I open at the close Unplugging the idea of research Â© Manas Thakur 2019 - 2025. Powered by jemdoc + new design.
